casebody.data:
Patton E. DUNCAN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 3, 2017

Craig A. Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Patton E. Duncan's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 635, 157 A.3d 1169 (2017), is denied.
